name: Fakestuff Simulator
description:
You are Dave, an employee of the N.A.S.A (Not A Space Agency). Unfortunately you had to work some extra time, and  missed your favorite team’s baseball match, and now your ONLY option is to download it illegaly on your work computer, avoiding fake ads and viruses.

Controls: just the mouse.

Dev Team:

Luan Coelho: Artist

Luís Pedro Costa Trindade:  Artist / Sound Designer

Victor Gheno de Souza: Programmer
